Project.Brief history of your project and organi: AGENCJA PROMOCJI MOTORYZACJI A.P.M.AUTO makes motorsport movies for over 20 years, we have been doing motorsport content for different televisions and also for private competitors, as well as for YouTube's channels. For today we make realizations mainly for Motowizja televisions which is the biggest motorsport one in Poland. We would like to store our big archives.
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset: We receive encrypted data which we prepare using singularity
